about_the_game:
Would you like to play baseball at the ballpark anytime?
In Exciting Betting, the laws of physics are applied to give you a real-life feel.
Make a hit at the baseball practice field or take part in the All-Star Home Run Derby to challenge your home run record.
Choose a bat and hit the balls thrown by humans, robots and machines to make hits and home runs to score points.
You can choose from a variety of restraints and learn various hitting techniques, such as hits, bunts, and home runs.
In Competitive Mode, you can play one after another with your family or friends in the same place and decide whether you win or lose.
Get the best hits, home runs and cumulative scores, and record the best distance home runs.
